rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 12 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:59 PM, 26 June 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Batangas, Pampanga, Rizal, Bataan and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad), Zambales(Masinloc, Candelaria, Santa Cruz), Tarlac(Tarlac City, La Paz, Victoria), Nueva Ecija(Bongabon, General Tinio, Laur, Palayan, General Mamerto Natividad, Rizal, Cabanatuan, Penaranda, Santa Rosa, Gabaldon), Quezon(Infanta, Real, Lucban, Sampaloc, Dolores, Tiaong), Laguna(Luisiana, Nagcarlan, Liliw, Majayjay, Rizal, Cavinti, Lumban, San Pablo) and Cavite(Amadeo, Indang, Mendez, Alfonso, General Emilio Aguinaldo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
